content.detailedDescription: Roar like jet all around the whole area others in town heard the noise also but there is over 10 miles separating those that heard it. this is a pretty rural area with only a small airport about 15 miles from here and this was no airplane
content.summary: Loud jet like roar

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the phone looking out the window on the 14th floor.   i watch planes go by all the time, and am familiar with the distances they need to keep.  
there was a plane going by, and i noticed a orange-amber light (not spherical, but squarish--the light seemed to have a square outline, or it had corners--it was between a circle and a square) a little bigger than venus near the plane, not in line with it. it was probably behind the plane but from my angle it looked like it was too close to the plane.  i kept watching it for a few seconds to make sure that it wasn't going to be an issue where the two would get too close. and then i noticed there was an identical object in the sky, in a straight line directly above the first object, but much further up in the sky than you would see two helicopters or jets flying in formation. the distance between them was about 5-10 degrees.  but they looked identical in size, shape, glow intensity.  

i didn't feel scared when i realized that they were unusual or unexplainable, i was just excited to keep watching them and see what they do. 
i watched them for about 20 seconds and i didn't notice any significant change in location or size.
i left the room i was in and quickly went out to another room to access the patio area. this took about 5 seconds.  when i looked up and tried to find them, they were gone. 


when i first saw the first object i thought it may be a helicopter, although the color of the light on it wasn't a color i normally see on helicopters.
content.summary: Two pink-orange lights in a straight line above each other, about 5-10 degrees apart over manhattan's upper west side near plan in flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
The closing night of camp at raquette lake culminates with a traditional speech given by the director that includes boys camp, girls camp, and all counselors, around a very large bonfire in the center of the soccer field at boys camp. the night was perfectly clear, and since the stars were much more interesting than the speech i was listening to, i laid back in the grass and stared at the night sky above. the only light within a few hundred yards was the glow of the bonfire. as i stared at the sky, three fluorescent green disks appeared from three separate horizons. the disks came together faster than the speed of traditional aircraft of the day without sound. they formed a perfect equilateral triangle formation directly above us somewhere, between 5,000 - 10,000 feet and then began to spin in unison maintaining their triangular positions. after several minutes of spinning in unison they "pulsed" away and within less than 2 seconds each was gone. before the speech was over, everyone had taken notice of what was happening over our heads, and even the director stopped speaking because of all the chatter and pointing going on all around him.

i was not at all surprised by what i had seen, as it's unreasonable to think that within our boundless universe, earth is the only planet capable of supporting life. 

i have believed in ufo's since reading library books about the subject when i was in 7th grade. this experience proved my belief.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over 1975 closing campfire of raquette lake boys camp

content.detailedDescription: My son joshua (age 36) and i had just left the movie theatre in tampa at the westshore plaza, it was around 6:30 pm on friday, february 10th 2012.  i told joshua to put his seat belt on and he said "no", then he said he heard very distinctive  voice in his head that said "you are moments away from something significant happening", but he still did not put his seatbelt on. he laughed and said to himself, that would be a bummer if we got into an accident and mom will tell me "i told you to put your seatbelt on"! we were now just on the st. petersburg side of the bridge at 6:35 and we were heading south towards st. petersburg on i275 traveling about 65 mph.  i was in the far left lane, the fast lane, and as i looked up in the sky i noticed 3 odd looking lights. i tried to slow down a bit but there were cars on the right of me and behind me and i was afraid to cause an accident.  i said to joshua, look at those lights honey, what do you see, he said yeah, those are......And then he said oh my god, those are not lights from a plane mom, i said "i know", i was looking at them as we approached them. i noticed it was exactly 6:40 pm on the car clock. it was 6:42 pm when we were right up near the object. they were on our right on the passenger side of the car. joshua put his window down for a better look, other than the noise from the wind and cars next to us, there was no sound like engines or anything coming from the lights themselves. there were 3 lights on our right side (west) of the car just off the interstate coming towards us. the farthest light was a normal headlight looking light, that would be on a plane, big and round, the next one closest was however bigger and still round, then the closest one to us was smaller in size and again, round.  there was a very small blinking red light between the first and second light and a white blinking light between the second and third light. very odd looking for a plane, we both agreed it was not a plane or a helicopter or anything that could be identified.  i was traveling now just near the sawgrass lake area of st. peterburg. it then came to a complete stop in the sky and hovered just directly across from us, about 20 degrees off the horizon and just over the tree line, we could clearly see as it began to shape shift and turn towards us counter clockwise, into a large black pewter looking triangle that had several lights on it. there were many, many white lights. i'm not sure how many. we were about 250 feet from this object. joshua was now hanging out the window, i was trying to drive in heavy traffic at 65 to 70 miles an hour, everything was happening so fast. i tried to hand joshua my cell phone for a picture, but i could not get it out of my purse easily and stay in my lane driving so fast, joshua said pull over mom, but there was no way as i was in the fast lane and i could not get over to the shoulder safely. i handed him the camera phone and he tried to take a picture but it was getting darker and the trees were now in the way, he could not get a good focus on the craft. i quickly made a call at 6:51 pm to a mufon fi to tell him what we saw and to report it while it was still fresh in our minds. i tried to give him as much information as i could so there would be a new set of ears on this investigation.  we drove on a bit and i was able to maneuver to the exit at 38th avenue north and then we re-entered the highway once again heading towards tampa (north) to try to get another sight of the craft.  as we passed where we had originally seen it on our left, (west) my side of the car, we could no longer see it. it was just gone. but we had not seen it leave as we watched the area as best we could as we were exiting and re-entering the highway.  we then got off the interstate on the 118th avenue exit towards clearwater and drove to 28th street no. heading south again we then pulled the car over to the shoulder and got out of the car to watch the sky and see what we could. we did not see the craft again.  we headed back home after about 10 minutes and re-entered the southbound lane on i275 again.  as we past the sighting area on our right (west) we noticed a car crash in the exact same place as we had seen the craft. there were 2 vehicles involved pulled over on the shoulder and two emergency type vehicles gathering the cars. they had yellow lights on the emergency vehicles. we then headed on towards home
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three lights came towards us and then they shifted into a triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: On february 26,2012 and 3 days in a row at approximately 8:30pm i noticed a very bright light glowing green and purple hovering over the foothills. i am located in north denver near 45th and xavier street. the object seemed to linger and hover for about 20 min and then it darted faster than a lightning bolt nw and behind the mountains. on the second day it did the same thing. on the third day the object was closer this time at least over i-70 and sheridan from me that was 6 blks west and 2 blks north. it only stayed for about 10 min and i noticed it had 2 balls of light glowing red and orange and purple below it. i tried to take a picture but it then zoomed away like the speed of light. i have a photo with it zooming away there were 2 objects in the photo not sure if it was the same one or if it split into 2.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Egg,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: On february 26,2012 and 3 days in a row at approximately 8:30pm i noticed a very bright light glowing green and purple hovering over the foothills. i am located in north denver

content.detailedDescription: I was walking into work at and notice 5 planes with chemtrails flying parallel to each other.  as i started looking for other aircraft, i came across this bright star looking object.   i spoke to an international longshoreman and asked him what he thought the object was.  he did not know.  i got a coworker to walk to the window and showed her.  she could not explain the object either.  i definitely counted 5 jets with chemtrails and could have been 6 (one flying perpendicular based on the trail.  the unidentified object stood still hoovering at a very high altitude.
content.summary: White object high in the sky during the day light.  5 jets went by with chemtrails.

content.detailedDescription: While driving back to work after a early lunch (11:40 am to be exact), i crested a hill not far from the house. from the small hill you can see towards elgin, ok and beyond to duncan, ok and okc. i noticed a object traveling at high speed parallel to the ground and then abruptly at a 40 degree angle shoot up into the atmosphere and disapear. not sure if i observed a meteor entering the atmosphere, perhaps skipping off the atmosphere or a rocket from a mrls at ft sill. i doubt the rocket though as i was looking to the ne away from ft sill and any impact ranges.  mrlrs ranges are west of post not east of i-44 in the direction of okc. maybe a meteor observed along the horizon that probably entered over the east coast? light refraction? but the abrubt change in direction is what caught my eye after it had run parrallel along the ground. i could not tell the distance to the object but it was moving as fast as a meteor would. perhaps others saw it?
content.summary: While driving, crested a hill and observed a object shoot up into sky

content.detailedDescription: Walking down the street. it was dark and object was allmost directly overhead.Wow.It went from stop to arclites over mountainhome air base 0ver 60 miles away in the blink of an eye and back more than once seen it several times that nite
content.summary: Reminded me of blunt cigar glowing red

content.detailedDescription: I was working. i went to my computer to check e-mail. when i turned around i saw what i thought at first were a flock of birds. i knew it was not a flock of birds because at the same time birds flew by right underneath the object. i looked closer and the object was black in the shape of a boomerang. i also noticed that the object looked like it was breaking apart but all the pieces were following. it kept a steady speed, and it did not change its shape. i watch the object for about two or three minutes until it passed over the building next to me.
content.summary: Black dotted boomerang shape. low cloud ceiling and traveled as if in a mist

content.detailedDescription: I was at work in a rock quarry in corona calif. on the control tower. it was between 9pm & 12am. i looked up and saw a orangish redish extremely large ball of light coming from the north straight at me. it got within 2 or 3 miles of me made a 90deg. turn at high speed and go east. it broke into two parts . the main part continued east ; the other broke of at a 30deg. angle to the north east. did any one else report a sighting like this one ,around the same time ?
content.summary: I saw a large orange ball coming at me very fast  @ 30 deg. to the horizon

content.detailedDescription: Last night there was a black out in my community. the lights went back on and i went outside and sat on the porch. looking straigt ahead i saw what i thought was a star. it was as bright as venus or jupiter looks in the night sky. in what feels like a moment , i notice the star than it moved real fast down, then backwards, then studdered twice up and disappeared. totally dark as if it was never there. no sounds were heard. no residue seen. just gone. this bright thing just gone. i just sat there wondering what i just saw. it happened so fast. my mind obviously started of thinking of things it could be- airplane, shooting star(metorite), weather balloon (lol) but it could not be any of these. i see planes flares metor showers- this was different and unexplainable. i am filling this out because i hope i am not the only one who saw this.
content.summary: Bright light thought it was a  star then it moved abruptly down then straight  up and disappeared- no trail or anything. this happened right after a black out- the lights went on in neighborhood .

content.detailedDescription: It was like 22hrs. i was checking my water cistern over the rooftop at home, so i was carrying a flashlight and i soon as i finished my job there, i was pointing my flashlight to the sky, like "playing" with the light beam. then, i saw this object, right above of my head, like a 400 or 500 meters from the ground, a black triangle with dim red lights at the corners. it wasn't making any kind of sound or leaving fume trail either, just flying in straight line with a left turn to the east until it was impossible to distinguish it from the other stars in the horizon. i think it was flying over at high speed because it took maybe no more than 15 secs. from the first time i saw it above my head and when it faded at the distance.
content.summary: Black triangle flying over with dim red lights at each corner.

content.detailedDescription: My mom just came home from work she wanted me to go to the bank with her. as we were heading down 15th ave west in bradenton florida my mom spotted two jets flying ahead of us and said look at those planes i never seen them fly in that position before i agreed then when we passed some trees thats when i spotted a solid orb floating in midair safely follwoing the two planes then my mom spotted another jet behind the orb it was then that i realized they were flying in a reverse triangle pattern i mentioned my idea to my mom and she agreed that was "wierd espicially with that orb centered in the middle as we pullued up to a stop sign we watched the orb for minutes then it vanished and the planes went on like nothing happened my mother told me to tell my step father and he directed me to you to tell my sightings.
content.summary: It aws a bright reddish orb floating between 3 planes heading west no clouds all of a sudden it vaneshes planes were in a triangular position with orb center my mother and i saw it clear as day

content.detailedDescription: They are still here. it is like watching fish in an aquarium. i do not think they ever leave, but dwell in the atmosphere. see attached for some i captured on mar 1, 2012. these i observed as fast moving luminescent clouds and took a few pictures.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo's over sherwood park

content.detailedDescription: Witness was awoken by a loud roar outside his home in the early morning. sound described as a whirring roar with a crackle/static sound.  he went outside to investigate the nose and noticed a large, triangle shaped craft hovering over a bay on the wolf river just to the east of the residence. craft was dark with no lights.  at that time, craft dropped several colored orbs over the water which spun for a brief moment and then took off at a high rate of speed.  the craft then hovered over the home in a westerly direction to a point directly over the wolf river.  the craft hovered for a short time and again dropped several colored orbs which took off at a high rate of speed following the wolf river upstream.(north)  the craft then also followed the river upstream in the direction of the orbs at a slow speed until the witness lost sight of the object.  deputies from winnebago and waupaca counties were contacted and dispatched to the scene.  they were unable to witness any of the events.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle like craft dropping colored orbs

content.detailedDescription:
When i notice these i'm always out side smoking or walking. also noticing them at different locations. either with a really close friend or when we ar seperate at different locations. its strange how we are always seeing these lights or objects, and its really making us kind of afraid but becoming quite the norm lately. i will list the description of each sighting so you can understand this isn't the normal thing...

also please keep inmind that this has been taking place in differrnt locations and seen by both of us together or sepret. and on different days in the last few months. and in different hights in the skies. i am only posting this to make it known and to get it out, as you know this isn't what most are willing or wanting to hear to give advice or to help us understand. ever since(and i posted this here after sighting took place) we had our close and i mean very close sight of this firey translucent looking shape shifting craft, it was scary, that warped our reality since. and yes i have photos of this firey looking object. its not verry clear but can draw what we saw through our binoculars. man it was mind trippy, the kind of stuff you see on movies...

but anyways here you go.
first is which my closest friend seen while i was way.
2 white star looking lights, what was thought as first but brighter, right next to each other and close to the horizonish. then boom one just drops out of no where, then a few after the nexts just drops out of the sky.

me and her seen, close to the horizon like really low. a white star streak across the sky at really high speed and vanish. other times we've seen similar events but can't remember exact details. other times we've caught lights that seemed close just disappeared. other times we've seen white translucent cigar oval shaped objects disappear slowly as if it was going into an invisable tunnel.

just the other night i seen what i thougt was a plane high, dot size, up above me kind of. going at an up angle untill the light was gone.

and durring these strange events, stranger things have been happening... lol
i assure you we are not "on anything" or drinking or anything of the like.
content.summary: Multiple sighting through out the months

content.detailedDescription:
My sister was driving and i was in the passenger seat. we turned down the road to get home and she widened her eyes and pointed. i thought she was pointing at the roof of a nearby house that was under construction. i examined the house and said "i don't get it" she didn't say anything she just stopped the car and thrusted her hand towards the direction of the sky. i looked up and there was a wobbly thing hovering. it was dark and had 3 white lights that faded in and out. the lights started pulsing faster as it picked up speed, flashed randomly and darted like lightning but stayed in view and began hovering again. we drove home and i immediately grabbed my phone a to recordd... i ran towards the area (which was right behind my house) and it was gone.

i have seen countless aircrafts in my life. i spent my childhood on an army base and spent 4 years married to an active duty usaf member ... lived on kadena afb and scott afb. also... i have spent my entire teenage years living right here next to lambert. i have never seen anything like this in my life.
content.summary: Strange wobbly dark ufo with flashy lights

content.detailedDescription: I was at the  middle school waiting for my child it was about 2:50 to 3:00 in between that time i was looking towards the sky. i noticed something in the sky as i was looking thru the windshield the object came close enough to were i could see a silver cylinder shape with no windows.  i also noticed a jet in the sky and the silver cylinder object was moving (from west to east in a straight direction) faster then the jet ( which was moving east to west and further above the object). i was on the phone with my boyfriend explaining to him what it looked like and told him i was hanging up because i have a older phone and can't take pictures and talk at the same time. but i was too slow and the object disappeared.
content.summary: Silver cylinder object flying in the sky

content.detailedDescription: On the night of august 1st 2011 at about 9:20pm, i was standing on my front porch while i watered my lawn. i was looking due west at the stars when i noticed a strange pair of strobing lights rising straight up. the lights strobed back and forth very fast, much faster and brighter than a plane, but maintained the same horizontal arrangement like a plane. the strobing lights continued rising to a height of about 4000 feet in a location that seemed to place it directly over lake hartwell. the lights rose and then in a blink were instantly back where they started. it didn't descend rapidly, there was no trail of light, it was just there again. the lights began rising again exactly the same, still strobing exactly the same, but when it got to the same altitude two things happened. the strobing lights started zigzagging or dancing across the sky heading south, and simultaneously a bright orange orb appeared and began following it. the orb tracked along slowly and perfectly parallel to the horizon a little below and behind the strobing light like it was keeping a safe distance or escorting it. the lights continued moving south until i could no longer see them. needless to say i was dumbfounded. the way the strobing light disappeared and reappeared instantly, dancing across the sky, all while maintaining the same consistent strobing pattern was overwhelming. it seemed like it was skipping forward in time more than flying. at this point i'm standing there thinking that i've either seen ufos or the atmospheric effects that make planes look like ufos. i'm thinking it's just after sundown, it's still 90 degrees out and crazy humid, maybe that explains it. no sooner than i think this i look up and the sky is full of planes. just out of nowhere there all these red and white strobing lights. they looked like wingtip lights and strobed like modern led lights, although there weren't any others, no fuselage lights etc. they were circling in the exact same location that i first saw the orb and strobing light. they never formed up or paired up like fighter jets until they left. they kept circling at a distance and at a much higher altitude than the lights were at, maybe as high as 30,000 feet. at one point there was so much movement in the sky i could no longer keep up, it was overwhelming seeing dozens of lights circling around with absolutely no sound. through this entire event nothing ever made a sound. the red and white strobing lights began to slowly widen their circling until they all broke off and left. i'm convinced that what i saw was a massive military response to ufos.
content.summary: Saw strange lights followed by massive military rsponse

content.detailedDescription:
Ok-- i'm outside  again videoing the stars and this large brite ufo coming out from the west of monterey bay i turn my video camera to film it.
i was very suprize of the size and how low it was going across the sky.
it was about7pm could not hear any motor noise as it went by...

would like to know if anyone seen this one...This was much different from what i been videoing.....And i have seen alot!

ok guys from mufon my colded is over so call me again to come over to view videos..
content.summary: Large white/red light it was large as a commercial airline coming from the west of monterey bay going south east through it was a comet?  have this on video!  all most called 911----

content.detailedDescription: While in my backyard i saw a starlike object (as bright as venus) floating in the skies at approximately 7:15pm. it was white-amber in color and traveling ne then east. it was moving slowly (like it was just floating) in the sky and it was so quiet. it must of been large and very high but it seemed like it was about 100 feet above my head....Probably because it was so bright. the sighting from start to finish lasted about 5 minutes. when it travelled away from me to the east it must of picked up speed because it disappeared in an instant. i took 8 photos with my iphone 3 but all are poor quality.
content.summary: Starlike object (as bright as venus) floating in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?  we were walking down our street about 5 minutes after 7 pm.  we were facing east, and the sun had already set.

2. what made you first notice the object?  we saw lights which we first thought were airplane lights.  we had the impression of a large airplane turning in our direction.  we never see this maneuver from a large airplane, so it caught our attention.  we thought something unusual was happening with the plane.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?  we thought it was an airplane, perhaps in the orlando air traffic pattern.  we saw a whitish light somewhat like a nose light on a passenger plane, and a bluish green light to the right side of the white light.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.  we thought that the object was making a turn in our direction - coming from the west toward the east.  after about 5 to 10 seconds the two lights disappeared and were replaced by a string of around 7 larger bright red lights. they were much larger than stars would appear, perhaps about 3-5 times the diameter of venus.  the lights did not flicker or twinkle. the lights vanished for a split second and reappeared to our right, an angle of about 10 degrees of change (more to the south),  and partially behind the edge of a cloud. it hovered briefly and then disappeared.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.  we were positive that we had seen something very unusual and hurried toward a higher elevation on the street with a bigger view of the horizon.   we were somewhat excited, obviously, but not particularly fearful of the sighting.  

6. how did you lose sight of the object?  it simply vanished.
content.summary: Looked like airplane lites then string of head lites in a string of 7

content.detailedDescription: Two ufo shows in picture taken.
content.summary: Two flying disks

content.detailedDescription: Around 7 o'clock on march the 1st, i seen a red ufo north on the north side of sarcoxie it was red with white around it. it left a white trail and i only seen it for about 2 or 3 seconds.
content.summary: Around 7 o'clock on march the 1st, i seen a red ufo north on the north side of sarcoxie it was red with white around it. it left a white trail and i only seen it for about 2 or 3 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Betweem 9 and 10 pm i was laying in bed looking out at the ocean as i was on vacation,as i was laying there i saw a orange light in the sky at first i thought it was a star then it moved.The object seemed to move from one spot to another in the sky without leaving any trail,very fast almost like disappear then reappear.It moved vertical in a diagonal direction then descended a bit.All this happening in about a 3-4 minute span after moving the object disappeared completely,so i layed back down in bed after about a minute or two the object reappeared above the ocean.This time i got up put on pants and went out on the deck after a couple movements again by the object it again disappeared.I then went back inside and went to sleep later that night sometime i reawoke it was out there again this time i ignored it and went back to sleep.It never reappeared the rest of my vacation in yachats.
content.summary: Star like ufo over ocean yachats oregon

content.detailedDescription:
Blue sky colorado day; driving west on i-70 between parachute and de beque; just north of the highway we noticed something almost above us hovering as we approached and passed it (as we approached, we were looking at the big beige tank just off the highway and wondering what it was for when we noticed this thing hanging in the air); we slowed down and looked back and it zipped to the northeast towards and behind the mountain; we thought it was something attached to a wire, but there were no wires around and it was above the poles/lines; no people or cars were around in the flat brush area or along the mountain; only a couple other cars on i-70 but they were heading east, no one near us for miles that were also heading west
seemed odd so reporting to see what it was or if anyone else saw it
content.summary: Black-grey shiny orb-shaped that did not look like metal, 4-5 feet diameter

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke when i thought i saw a constellation in my peripheal vision float across the sky. as i focused, i realized there were 3 orbs in triangle formation traveling north. they descended slightly bending east. the front orb split into two and then all 4 abrubtly turned northwest traveling at an unimaginable speed over the horizon. they were yellow glowing orbs, very bright. there was also not a sound from the objects and the night sky was almost completely clear that night. i immediately called my friend that i had just been talking to 15 minutes prior and asked him if he had "just saw that!" his response, "you saw it too?!?" i asked him to explain when and what he saw before i told him what i saw. he said it was about 5 minutes ago (3-4 mins before mine, he lived just southwest of me a few miles away) and it was a "tear drop" that "dripped." he said he turned around to get another friend to look up, but by the time they looked back up it had disappeared.
content.summary: 4 glowing orbs travel north over central florida

content.detailedDescription:
Since january 6, 2012, the ufos have been in the night sky and i have taken many photos. i have done more filming and have some very interesting footage. i told some friends about the ufos who went out and also saw them over clinton and plainfield, indiana. 

last night, i was talking by phone with a friend in south dakota and i told him to go outside with binoculars and look around. he came back and told me there was one ufo that he could see. what he described matched what i've been seeing in blanford. while he was watching the one in south dakota i went out and saw several at the same time. one was directly over my house, but, rather high up. look for human like shapes around the ufos. every clear night they are here.
content.summary: Ufos have been in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
On valentines day 2011, at midnight, my boyfriend and i were at beaverkill pond which is at the end of the private road where we live in woodstock (on ohayo mountain).  it was a clear night and i had my camera with me.  i took a few photos of the moon and then focused my attention on a very bright star.  took a few photos of that. it wasn't until i got home and uploaded the photos that i noticed the star had a triangular shape and when i zoomed in....Saw what appeared to be a ufo.  
i have 5 photos of it:  

1. triangular shape:  pointing at 9:00, 11:00 and 2:00
2. "s" wormy shape
3. bright light with an illuminated trail behind it

please let me know if you use these photos so that i can alert some friends who are also interested in this.

you can contact me at home on mondays, thursdays and saturdays.
content.summary: I was photographing what i thought was a very bright star.

content.detailedDescription: I have observed two ufos in early to late evening (2:00am one night) on the last two nights. the smaller of two objects is spherical in nature, i have had daylight sightings of it before. it hangs out over our area on a regular basis. the larger of the two objects is chevron shaped with three bright lights on the edges of craft. i could not see the top or bottom it was two far away to see much detail other than the the bright search type lights along the sides. it appears in our northwestern sky about the same level of the moon visually. it was not out of the atmosphere last night because i saw a aircraft pass directly between myself and the object probably 35,000 feet up or so. tuesday night the larger of the two crafts was just hanging out not doing much it was further north and west than the smaller local ufo. wensday night the larger of the two crafts was back with the small one and it started out higher and further north and west of the smaller objects. it was shooting red and bright blue light beams at a unknown or unseen object west and south of where it was hovering, this was about 7pm. smaller object seems to be there for an observer it did not particpate in light show other than its normal white lighting appearance. although i did not see a third object, i have seen the larger of the two objects around before and was firing at a third object and apparent had smaller possibly fighter craft out doing their own shooting of lights and i even have seen it with large explosions possibbly small craft exploding but no proof. i saw it launch the smaller crafts. i did not see any of the smaller crafts last night though. about 10pm i took my dog out for his walk before bedtime. i observed the larger of the two craft swiftly desending toward the horizon. i m not sure what caused this to happen although my scanner reported no crashes of any crafts in the area, it has happend before though i never did find out if they found it or not. it could have landed under control. we are surround by the mark twain national forrest area and there are plenty of remote unpopulatted areas. i took my dog back out about an hour later and they had both had left the area and i went to bed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
